/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with blue scaffolding, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome cityscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and bicycles navigating their way through the urban maze. A large overpass looms in the background, a testament to the city's impressive infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the concrete jungle below.
